name: Heckin'Ball
description:
Controls

WASD to move

Space to roll

Objective 

You have just managed to escape your prison in the dungeon by enhancing your heckin' ball with magic. You now need to make your way to the exit of this dark and scary dungeon, and live your new happy life!

Gameplay

You run around and bonk all the skellies you can find to make your way through all the chambers of the dungeon. But can you find the secret?

Gametime

Around two to four minutes

General

Made in gamemaker studio 2 for the https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021 game jam.

The game is made by Mattias "Mau" Lundell, Rick Åström and Gustav "Gurkan" Dyrendahl, also known as Thicc Productions.
